website_summaries.verdict: The overall response for the Nike Flex RN 2017 has been positive. Runners liked its cool looks, its apparently comfortable construction and its versatility on the asphalt. The casual shoe-enthusiasts were also happy about it. There were a few naysayers who reported some concerns about its durability and the fit.
pros: Some consumers wrote that it felt great when running in the Nike Flex RN 2017
The multi-purpose design of this shoe worked well for many users
they wrote that they were able to wear it for various activities, including running, gym workouts and casual walks
A runner admired its lightweight nature because it kept her ankles safe from discomfort
Many considered the price of the Nike Flex RN 2017 to be affordable
The flexibility of the upper and the mid-sole worked well for those who wanted to take advantage of the natural movement of their feet
The design of this product is fashionable, according to many of those who have tried it
A majority of consumers felt that it was true-to-size
A lot of runners noted that this shoe was generally comfortable
cons: The upper unit tore apart after only a couple of months, reported a purchaser
Some users stated that the outsole wore away very quickly, losing its efficacy in the process
This shoe felt narrow for several runners

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The soles pick up every single rock or pebble you come across...so when you get home you have to pick them out with a scissor or screw driver. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes cause I walk. They said for running but there’s no way. These shoes are thin and flimsy. The side of the shoe ripped just after a week. There is minimal support in them. They have to be knock-offs cause I’ve always bought Nike and never had a pair like these. The soles of the shoes don’t even match. I’m so disappointed with Amazon. It seems all clothes and shoes bought here lately have not what has been at all what you see.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Knight

customer_reviews.title: Received only ONE shoe
customer_reviews.text: i was so angry i put it in the trash what kind of service quality and shipment control could this company have such a waste of money and time. will NEVER buy or recomend
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great all round walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: They wear out quickly - I'm on my second pair, but they are a comfy shoe. Not sure I could run in them, but I don't run anyway. They are lightweight and fashionable. I will buy them again, I'm sure. I wear a 9 and bought 9.5. Without socks this is a perfect fit, so you may want to go up half size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but
customer_reviews.text: I wore this shoe for TWO years (3x week) before the heel was no longer supportive. It’s comfortable, long lasting. The toe box is flat so I had to break it in. And—even double-knotted the laces still untie! Weird!!
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nike seems to run small these days, I usually wear an 8.5 in workout shoes last pair I ordered a 9, and they were a bit short. This pair I ordered a 9.5 and they're perfect. This is my third pair of Flex, different styles but I really like the fit and the weight. I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits somewhat tight
customer_reviews.text: The length and width were good, the height of the shoe left something to be desired. The shoe is very tight around the area of the foot where the metatarsals are located. The eyelets actually dog into the top of my foot causing blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy & Josephine Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great support in this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I'm a zumba girl and do lots of jumping, squats and turns. The shoe has great support in all the right places, particularly in the balls and heels of the foot. I'm a size 9 and ordered a size 10 and still found the shoe more snug than I thought it would be when wearing socks. I decided to keep the shoe because of the great support but will order a 10.5 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Naturally Natural

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and I can run 4
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase the Nike Flex for my running shoes.This pair run a bit smaller than prior versions so you might one a half-size larger. They are comfortable and I can run 4.5 miles without problem, but I don't feel they are as cushioned as prior versions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad to return these. I order a 10 since I am an 9.5 wide but the shoes were too tight. They are super cute and comfy, a size 10.5 is sold on here for far too much so I ordered them off of GOAT for 40 bucks cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Description says men’s but product was sized for women!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but the description is confusing. The main description says men’s but the size and shoe choice doesn’t. After I placed the order then the order description says women’s. We had to order 3 pairs before we got it figured out!!! The good thing is that returns were a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fourth pair of Nike Women's Flex 2017 RN Running Shoes that I've bought since they came out. They take a lot of wear and tear, and I wear them everywhere! I know I will buy another pair within the next 6 months. I love them that much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice support for my flat foot but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my 3rd pair of these I love them. Nice arch support. Really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Rhea

customer_reviews.title: oh so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haave 4 pair ofSketcher tennis shoes and these Nike's are so much more comfortable. My feet are fairly narrow and it's so hard to get tennis shoes to fit correctly. Pulling the laces tight against my instep are usually too tight. When I loosen them then my heel slips. These NIKE flex 2017 Run shoes fit really well. I will look for other colors.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE KEPPLE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: These look even better in person and are incredibly lightweight but durable. They have a type of mesh on the top and sides of the shoe, that allows for air flow. I would order these again
customer_reviews.author: JGLS

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes in January and the sole is completely falling apart on them within a couple months. Also, one arch was higher in one shoe than the other.. which has made it so uncomfortable. I wouldn’t recommend his product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to buy any other shoe for work and for every day wear. I loved them so much I bought 2 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - very comfortable. I'm a size 9.5 and sized up because Nike typically runs small, however these we very spacious. I could have gone with my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: crsees2008

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much. They fit as expected and are super lightweight and comfortable. Look exactly like pictured. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Run a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hospital nurse. Work 12-hour shifts. Love these for work. Very lightweight. Roomy at toes. Run a bit small. I normally wear 9-1/2. Wear 10 in these.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, flexible, go-to shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to work shoes- they are comfy, breathable, and I can be in them all day. Second pair I have bought (first pair lasted about a year, but then became a bit too worn). I like how they look too; cute but also good for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelse

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite Nike shoes so far! They are cute, comfy, and very light! I have them in blue too but I wanted them in black so they would match with everything and I could wear them more often. They are great for running and have great grip. My shoe of choice for my weekly workouts. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but narrow ( and I have narrow feet). Also the shoelaces are very short so I will have to buy those too.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Same as all Nike
customer_reviews.text: Traditional, basic everyday wear it is perfect. However, if you are buying these for long hours of standing I recommend an insole. Nike doesn’t always strive for complete comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Second skin
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I’m on my feet all day and these have been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: B. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes ! This is my second pair and they’re great ! So comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair and hope they never change this model!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Over priced from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Very comfortable. Shoe is light weight. Great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Comfy, lightweight, and no need to "break them in" since they do not rub/cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Start the New Year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes as a motivator for the New Year! In my experience, Nike runs small. I normally wear a 9-9 1/2 so I ordered at 10 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ... girl foot normally wear 10 but this 11 is perfect for
customer_reviews.text: I have a big girl foot normally wear 10 but this 11 is perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slim fit and thin shoe for summer. Not much support. Tongue on the shoe is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves them...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter and she loves them for PE class.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is the 2nd pair I got as a backup because I love them so much. I always need a size larger in Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Kladis

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. Super light. Should have gotten a 6.5 because they are a tad snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: I wore the shoes for a week and the side tore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacking comfort
customer_reviews.text: They actually hurt worse than the shoes I have had for 3 years
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Giles

customer_reviews.title: I like the way they fit and they are very light ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they fit and they are very light weight. In fact I’m ordering a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Perfect fit. Great toebox. Perfect relative to using proper gait pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these! For working out, and for everyday life.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she seems to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's light and they're really cute and have good support on your foot but they're a little snug but still a really nice shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable cross training shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Not only cute, but comfortable for cross training. I get shin splints and the arch support is obvious as soon as I put them on. I may have to add some if I get back into long distance running, but for training at the gym... I couldn’t be happier with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

product_meta.title: Nike Women's WMNS Flex 2017 Rn Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Nike women’s running shoes.Model: Women’s Flex 2017 RN. Reference: 898476-001.
feature_bullets: Dynamic Flywire cables provide a one-to-one fit
